## Profile

Currently I am a graduate student of State Key Laboratory of Cognitive Neuroscience and Learning, Beijing Normal University, working at the Center for Beijing Aging Brain Rejuvenation Initiative (BABRI) (PI: Prof. Zhanjun Zhang). My research interest is the neural mechanism of cognitive aging using MRI.

**ResearchGate**: [https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Zilin-Li-10](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Zilin-Li-10)
